alt: A pixel art version of Becca, holding a purple staff with blue lighting coming from the tip.
description: Not Becca's favourite adventure, but it was still lucrative!

alt: Becca wearing a purple t-shirt, purple miniskirt, and purple boots.
description: This was a tough world to navigate, but she managed.

alt: Becca wearing a purple crop top, side skirt, and ankle wraps.
description: With minimal options, Becca managed to stay fashionable.

alt: Becca wearing a pink corset and athletic coat, with a pink sequin pencil skirt and black heels.
description: She definitely wasn't a fan of having someone else in her head.

alt: Becca wearing a translucent bodysuit and purple cape, holding a Japanese fan.
description: When faced with a choice between two families, Becca chose neither.

alt: Becca wearing a grey tube top with a purple cropped jacket, purple miniskirt, and purple socks and tennis shoes.
description: After eating all those gods, you'd think she'd be full...

alt: Becca in a purple bikini top, purple sleeves, purple miniskirt, and purple sandals.
description: She never did understand what guilds were at war...

alt: Becca in a purple Roman gladiator set, with her hair in a ponytail.
description: For someone who is already immortal, she struggled with this adventure.

alt: Becca in a purple sundress with sheer purple stockings.
Becca wearing a purple mage's robe and brown sandals, holding a purple lightning staff.
description: Help the tyrannical overlord? Yes please!

alt: Becca wearing a purple robe, stockings, and heels, wielding a purple quarterstaff.
description: Finally, a chance to prove the strength of her magic.

alt: Becca wearing a purple sports bra, miniskirt, and mesh gloves and stockings.
description: It was fun for her to meet heroes from so many worlds.

alt: Becca wearing a frilly purple barmaid dress and purple heels.
description: Never thought she'd see the day where someone called her a saint.

alt: Becca wearing a purple arcanists robe.
description: One could say she found her path.

alt: Becca wearing a frilly purple top, matching skirt, and gladiator sandals. She holds a wand in each hand.
description: She was far too vein to let Rosalia become Godwoken instead of her.

alt: Becca wearing a purple dress and black heels, lightning magic charged up in her palms.
description: She really came here for the College of Winterhold.
